title: Oi, Riot! What's that juicy, juicy Dragon KNIGHT Morde lore?!

replies.body:
Did somebody call for me? Do you have a...

_SKIN LORE QUESTION_
Does this mean in his dragon knight lore mordekaiser will be using more realistic dragons whereas the yordles have these cartoony ones?

shrug.jpg

That skin is so olde you have to put an e on the end.

Ye Olde Morde?
Does have a nice ring to it.
I feel like that'd make a fantastic skin for Morde
Obviously a teaser for his VGU in 2019

Hells yea!

Heimer is talking about Mord corrupting dragons, care to share more information on the matter?
Is his "corruption" the enslavement of dragons? 
Or maybe tricking them into granting him power (Sauron and the Elves style)?

Sure!

Swain is corrupted by dragons, Morde corrupts dragons with his evil, and Zyra controls dragons directly -- kind of like an evil Dragon Trainer.
So Zyra > Morde?
Not really, it's just that she doesn't corrupt them in order to control them, she just "talks their language" kind of.

Waiiiiiiiiiiit.....
Malicious Metal has a brother?
A brother from another mother.

Yes, me, me!

How powerful is Dragon Knight Mordekaiser really?
Also, what is his backstory? We do know current Morde's origin but what's the story of the Dragon Knight who sought to corrupt the dragons?

And thirdly; Is he more of an independent player, where does he stand in the grand scheme of things compared to the Dragon Master (Who ironically seems to be a mere pawn to the Dragons), the Sorcress, the Slayers and the Trainers?

And finally;
Any favorite Mordekaiser skin and your personal headcanon on the Skin's lore?

1. extremely powerful
2. i'll be filling that bit in on the skin tabs soon
3. i think every time the dragons come back, certain individuals are to blame. the first time the dragons rose had to be for a reason...
4. favorite morde skin? right now probably the high stakes one. he feels so.... **beefy**
~~Pls write some dialogue for KoC, DK and PK Morde when he gets reworked then~~
I'm not quite certain what you mean by "beefy" but I agree
Why do Yordles tame dragons while others kill them?

Holy shit. A dialogue prompt that involves Mordekaiser.      Never thought i would see that again in my life time

One day, long ago, a group of bugs from alpha testing the original Dragon in League manifested into Dragon Knight Mordekaiser. Mordekaiser struck the Death Recap instantly, turning it into a bug-ridden mess to this day(hence Dragon has {{item:3087}} damage). Then, he forced a rework on himself, so that no Mordekaiser main could play him without experiencing at least 10 bugs per game, ruining the experience. His reign finally ended when a midget called "The Donger" had some baby dragons spit on him, causing him to bugsplat.
Somehow I knew we'd see this post from you... ;)
